Title: San Francisco Tenderloin
Description: On the evening of March 23, 2014, the shooters were arguing with a crowd outside of a club, which prompted them to retrieve arms from their car for the attack. Eight people were wounded by the attack, and there were no fatalities. The shooters were later apprehended.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Patrons outside of a club
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooters were arguing with a crowd outside of a club, which prompted them to retrieve arms from their car for the attack.

Title: San Francisco Tenderloin
Description: On the evening of March 23, 2014, the shooters were arguing with a crowd outside of a club, which prompted them to retrieve arms from their car for the attack. Eight people were wounded by the attack, and there were no fatalities. The shooters were later apprehended.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Patrons outside of a club
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooters were arguing with a crowd outside of a club, which prompted them to retrieve arms from their car for the attack.

Title: Fort Hood
Description: On April 2, 2014, a 34-year-old Army Specialist began shooting at Fort Hood where he was stationed. He killed 3 military personnel and wounded 16 others before committing suicide.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Military personnel, soldiers, hospital employees
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooter was experiencing outbreaks from his mental health issues and had gotten into an argument with a superior when he had requested leave.
History of Mental Illness - Detailed: The shooter was being treated for depression and anxiety prior to shooting at Fort Hood. He was awaiting diagnosis for post-traumatic stress disorder at the time of his death.

Title: Kennesaw FedEx
Description: On the morning of April 29, 2014, a 19 year-old package handler at the FedEx in Kennesaw, Georgia arrived at his place of work and began shooting. He wounded six of his coworkers before committing suicide.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: FedEx employees
Possible Motive - Detailed: No known motive

Title: Isla Vista
Description: On the evening of May 23, 2014, a 22-year-old student and resident of Isla Vista stabbed two roommates and their friend to death in his apartment. He then drove to a sorority house in Isla Vista and attempted to enter the premises to no avail, and began shooting at a neighboring sorority's members, killing two and wounding another. He continued shooting between altercations with police throughout Isla Vista, killing another male student and wounding six more before committing suicide.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Two roommates and a friend of the roommates, members of Alpha Phi and Delta Delta sororities, Isla Vista residents and UC Santa Barbara students
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooter was suffering from mental illness, which triggered violent thoughts and behavior after failures with social and sexual relationships that he was unable to obtain
History of Mental Illness - Detailed: The shooter had been sent to psychological treatment since the age of nine. After the age of eighteen, the shooter began to shun psychotherapy and seized taking medication. His family believe that he was suffering from Asperger's Syndrome.

Title: Seattle Pacific University
Description: On June 5, 2014, a 26-year-old man entered a hall on the campus of Seattle Pacific University and began shooting at students. The shooter killed one student and injured two others before a student tackled and stopped the shooter as he was reloading.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: One male student was killed, one male and one female student were injured
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooter appears to have been taking medication for mental health issues and was suffering from depression. At the time of the shooting, the shooter had ceased to take his prescribed medication.
History of Mental Illness - Detailed: The shooter had been diagnosed with obsessive-compulsive disorder and transient psychosis, for which he had been prescribed medication.

Title: Nellis Plaza
Description: On the afternoon of June 8, 2014, a man and his wife approached two police officers having lunch in Las Vegas and began shooting, killing them both. The couple then fled to Walmart, where they killed an armed civilian attempting to stop the shooters. The man was killed by police and the woman killed herself at the Walmart.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Two police officers, armed citizen trying to stop shooters
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooters held anti-government beliefs, which lead them to choose police officers as their victims. The third victim was an armed civilian that attempted to stop the shooters.

Title: Bourbon Street New Orleans
Description: On June 29, 2014, two men were having an argument on Bourbon Street, which escalated into a gunfight. Many shots were fired into the surrounding crowd, killing one and injuring nine.
Shooter Name:
Trung Le, 
The second gunman has not been identified.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: One bystander dead and nine injured at the scene
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooter's attorney claims that he shot in self-defense when an unidentified man began shooting at a group of the defendant's friends.

Title: Albuquerque Auto Shop
Description: The shooter pulled up to an auto shop and saw his ex-girlfriend talking with her current boyfriend. He crashed his car into the car the couple was standing next to. This knocked the current boyfriend to the ground. The shooter then fired fatal shots at his ex-girlfriend, and shot and injured three other women who had entered the shop.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter's ex-girlfriend
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooter may have been jealous of his ex-girlfriend's new relationship, and angry with her. Apparently the shooter had spoken on the phone with the victim shortly before the shooting and heard the victim's new boyfriend's voice in the background. He sent the victim text messages saying "you tell that (expletive) I'm going to go for him" and "u stupid (expletive) u answered your phone and I heard"

Title: Marysville-Pilchuck High School
Description: On October 24, 2014, a freshman at Marysville-Pilchuck High School approached a table of his friends in the school cafeteria and a verbal fight ensued. The student then pulled out a handgun and fired at the students at the table. He injured five students, killed 1 girl, and then committed suicide by shooting himself in the head. Three of the four injured students died in the hospital in the following days.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Five fellow students including 2 cousins and a girl with whom he may have pursued a romantic relationship
Possible Motive - Detailed:
Earlier in the week the shooter sent several text messages to one of the girls he killed including "I hate that I can't live without you," "You can't make a bond with anyone like the bond me and you have right now," and "It won't last." That girl is said to have been the girlfriend of one of the boys the shooter killed. Law enforcement officials suspect that a romantic relationship between the shooter and this girl may have played a role in the motive, but that is unconfirmed.
(The report said the shooter's motive remains unclear, but classmates told police his girlfriend had broken up with him the day before and he had recently been in a fight with a football player over alleged "racial" comments.)

Title: Florida State University
Description: On November 19 just after midnight,  a graduate of Florida State University went to a library on campus which was full of people. He opened fire, injuring three people. Police arrived and told the shooter to drop the weapon, but he refused. Police then fired at the shooter, killing him.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: A male library employee and two male students. It does not appear that shooter specifically targeted these individuals.
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooter appeared to have been suffering from paranoia, with the thinking that he was a "targeted individual." A few days before the shooting he posted on the Targeted Individuals International Facebook page "has anyone here ever been encouraged by your handler to kill with a promise of freedom?" Police believe he believed he was targeted by the government.
History of Mental Illness - Detailed: The shooter had been struggling with financial and relationship issues in the months leading up to the shooting. He confessed to a family friend that he was afraid someone was trying to kill him, and that while he was living in New Mexico someone had threatened him with a gun. He considered himself a "targeted individual." In September, the shooter called police saying that he heard voices coming through the walls talking about him and his present activities. In October, he was hospitalized for mental health.

Title: Cedarville Rancheria Tribe
Description: On February 20, 2014, a 44-year old woman went to a tribe eviction meeting where she killed three family members and a worker. After running out of ammunition, the shooter grabbed a butcher knife and stabbed another person.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The victims are the shooter's brother, niece, nephew, and a tribal administrator
Possible Motive - Detailed: The tribe was meeting in the headquarters about evicting the shooter and her son from the Rancheria tribe. The shooter had been under federal investigation over at least $50,000 in missing funds.

Title: Memphis
Description: On Jan. 1, 2015, 25 people were on a party bus that was shot at by people in two vehicles that followed the bus. At least one of these men had been in a verbal argument with one of the bus' passengers at a club where the party bus had stopped just before the shooting.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: People riding on a party bus, including a man who had been in an argument with the shooter
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooters had been in a verbal fight with one of the passengers on the bus that they shot.

Title: Moscow
Description: On Friday, January 10, 2015, a man shot his adoptive mother in her house, walked to his landlord's nearby office and shot and killed him and injured another person in the office. He then drove to an Arby's that his parents frequented, asked to see the manager, and shot and killed her.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter's adoptive mother, landlord, and an Arby's manager
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Queens
Description: Early in the morning of January 24, 2015, a man shot his two daughters, wife, and mother-in-law, killing all but one of his daughters. The shooter  then went to his car and shot himself.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter's daughters, girlfriend, and girlfriend's mother.
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooter had told acquaintances that he believed his girlfriend (common-law wife) was cheating on him.

Title: LaGrange
Description: On January 28, 2015, in a Georgia home, a man shot three family members and one friend, and strangled his daughter in law. All five died. He left town with the family's dog, and police arrested him several days later.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter's wife, step-daughter, mother-in-law, father-in-law, and a friend
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown , Investigators are  working to determine a motive

Title: Omaha
Description: On the morning of January 24, 2015, two shooters opened fire at a party outside a home in Omaha. Three were killed and five others were injured. One of the suspected shooters was arrested, but the other has not been identified. Possibly gang-related.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: People at a party
Possible Motive - Detailed: Possibly gang-related

Title: Chapel Hill
Description: On the evening of Feb. 10, 2015, a man entered the apartment of three Muslim students with whom he had an ongoing dispute about parking space. The man was a fellow resident of the apartment complex. He shot all three people in the head, killing them.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Three Muslim students at University of North Carolina
Possible Motive - Detailed: Police have cited "an ongoing neighbor dispute over parking" as a possible cause for the shooting, though it may also have been related to race, as he called himself a "gun-toting atheist" and his daughter said that she refused to communicate with him because "hi Facebook posts became extremely hateful and began bashing others' religious beliefs."

Title: Monroeville Macy's
Description: On the evening of Feb. 7, 2015, a teenager entered Macy's at the Monroeville Mall, approached a man and spoke briefly with him. Then he shot him and two bystanders. The shooter left the scene, but was arrested the next morning.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The target was a convicted felon who was an acquaintance of the shooter, two bystanders were also injured.
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooter spoke briefly with his target before shooting him and injuring two bystanders.

Title: Moon Lake
Description: Early morning on Feb. 9, 2015 two shooters with significant criminal records entered a house Moon Lake and shot the four residents of the house. Three of the victims were killed and the fourth was injured and escaped the house after the shooters left. The shooters escaped and were arrested a week later.
Shooter Race: White American or European American/Some other Race
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Four residents of a house in Moon Lake where drug deals supposedly occur. Police indicate that this was likely a "targeted hit."
Possible Motive - Detailed: Drug use or drug deal, Sheriff told reporters that it appears to be a targeted hit over drugs.

Title: Tyrone
Description: Late night on February 26, a man entered the home of two of his cousins and shot them. Their daughter escaped the home and called the police. The shooter proceeded to four other nearby residences, killing two more of his cousins and three other acquaintances. The shooter then drove to another county and killed himself in his car. The shooter's mother, who lived with the shooter, was found dead from lung cancer in her home.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Four of the shooter's cousins and four acquaintances. All were the shooter's neighbors.
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooter lived with his mother, who died of lung cancer in her home shortly before the shootings. It is possible that her death contributed to the shooter's motive. The shooter?s autopsy showed he had a 0.256 percent blood-alcohol content ? more than three times the legal limit to drive in Missouri ? as well as marijuana and over-the-counter painkillers and allergy medicine in his system. Police say a motive has not been determined at this time and the investigation is ongoing.

Title: Morgantown
Description: On December 1, 2014, a man entered the home of his ex-girlfriend and shot and killed her and her new boyfriend. He then proceeded to the home of a business rival, whom he killed, and the home of another man with whom his ex-girlfriend had been involved, whom he also killed. The shooter then drove to another county and shot himself.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The victims were the shooter's ex-girlfriend, her current boyfriend, another man she with whom she had been romantically involved, and the owner of a towing company that competed with the shooter's towing company.
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooter posted statements on Facebook complaining of relationship problems with one of the victims: "I poured out my heart to her only to be manipulated as to what  I could give her." "This was not the plan but a struggle to see that those who strives to hurt me received their fair pay of hurt like I received." One of the shooter's victims had filed a domestic violence case against him a month before the shooting.

Title: Douglasville
Description: On February 7, 2015, a man entered the house of his ex-wife and shot her, two of their children, her boyfriend, and wounded two of her children. He then went onto the street and shot himself.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter's ex-wife, two of their children, his ex-wife's boyfriend, and two of his ex-wife's children
Possible Motive - Detailed: Investigators suspect that the shootings occurred over a fight between the shooter and his ex-wife over taxes and child support.

Title: McAvan's Pub
Description: Shortly after midnight on February 1, 2015, a man forced his ex-girlfriend at gunpoint to bring him to McAvan's Pub, where a birthday party with her relatives was taking place. The woman's brother attempted to separate her from her companion, at which point the man opened fire, injuring six people including his ex-girlfriend's brother.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter's ex-girlfriend's brother, others in the pub
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooter said to his ex-girlfriend that she had cooperated with police in a past investigation of the shooter.

Title: Clarkesville
Description: On February 22, 2015, A former police officer fatally shot his ex-wife and her friend, then wounded a local sheriff and a deputy at his ex-wife's home on Sunday before he was killed by the return fire from law enforcement.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter's ex-wife, his ex-wife's friend, a local sheriff, and a sheriff's deputy
Possible Motive - Detailed: A long-simmering domestic dispute that had been going on between the shooter and his ex-wife.

Title: Killeen
Description: On Sunday night of February 22, Fort Hood soldier opened fire on three people, killing two and injuring one before forcing his wife into another home, where he killed her and then himself.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Three of neighbors and the shooter's wife
Possible Motive - Detailed: Officers had recently been at the shooter's house for an unspecified domestic disturbance.

Title: Charlotte
Description: On February 24, 2015, "America's Next Top Model" contestant was killed in a triple homicide at her boyfriend's home.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Two men and one woman. The victims and suspects knew each other.
Possible Motive - Detailed: The victims knew each other and that the shooting may have been drug-related.

Title: Birmingham's Washington Park
Description: On February 27, 2015, the online Facebook brawl between two groups of friends spilled out into the streets with a planned videotaped fight.  After the melee ensued, two teenage males pulled out guns and started shooting at the girls. The shots killed 14-year-old girl and wounded two others.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Several fighting girls at the Park
Possible Motive - Detailed: The teen felt pressured to show up, and between two groups of girls melee ensued . One of the suspects was dating one of the girls who was fighting.

Title: Tarboro
Description: On Saturday afternoon of February 28, 2015, one of the fatal shootings happened at the Master's Touch barber shop around 1 p.m. Another shooting  happened at a nearby mobile home park. A woman and man were shot in that encounter. Police later shot and killed the suspected gunman after they tracked down the suspect.
Relationship to Incident Location:
Place of business/employment
Place of residency
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Three of shooter's neighbors
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown, The investigation's division is still working on finding out the motive because it is a little more complex because there is so much history and background involved.
History of Mental Illness - Detailed:
The man was delusional and had been treated for mental issues.
The shooter had been repeatedly treated for mannerisms indicative of paranoid schizophrenia within recent years.

Title: Brookhaven
Description: On early Friday morning of March 13, the man accused of shooting  the owners of a house, killing the two and critically injuring the other three. The man rented a room in the house. The man and the house owner had argued about something, and the man pulled out a gun and started shooting. He was found dead on Saturday, May 31, 2015 in his cell.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: All five members of house owner's family
Possible Motive - Detailed: The owner of house and the shooter had argued.

Title: Cottonwood
Description: On Sunday night of March 15, the man broke into a house and killed two people including his wife and shot another person before turning the gun on himself.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter's wife and mother-in-law, and a family friend
Possible Motive - Detailed: A warrant was active for the man in regards to an ongoing domestic situation. Court documents indicate the man's bond was revoked because of a violation of a family violence protection order. The shooting may have been domestic in nature between the  man and his wife.

Title: Mesa
Description: On March 18, 2015, the shootings started with an argument inside a motel room that spilled outside, one man dead and two women wounded. The gunman then shot another man who was working at a nearby restaurant. The gunman got away from the restaurant by carjacking the school instructor's car. The man then went to an apartment complex about 2 miles away, and shot another man. Another man was found in a neighboring apartment building with multiple gunshot wounds.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The dead victim knew the suspect. Records show the men served time in state prison several years ago, but state corrections officials say they never were housed in the same unit. A man with a social relationship with the shooter and dead victim's his mother, and his neighbors.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Drugs, money initially motivated

Title: Little Water
Description: On March 19, 2015, police officer was shot and killed after responding to a domestic violence situation. The shooter was holding his family hostage and allegedly pistol-whipped his wife and mother. The suspect led police on a 40-mile chase from New Mexico to Arizona before he was shot and killed.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: One police officer and two tribal officers
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooter was beating his wife and mother with a pistol at their home. The suspect led police on a 40-mile chase.  After car chasing ended, the shooter opened fire on officers.

Title: Panama City Beach
Description: On March 28, 2015, seven people were wounded, several critically, in a shooting at a Spring Break house party early Saturday. The shooter was arrested after the shooting.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed:
Seven people, including at least three college students
The students were innocent victims who were in the wrong place when an altercation broke out and shots were fired. (The suspect is not an AAMU student)
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooter has been arrested at least six times over the last four years in Mobile County on a number of misdemeanor charges: gambling, drug possession, disorderly conduct and loitering. There was altercation.

Title: Daytona Beach
Description: On April 3, 2015, four people were shot early Friday morning at a house party near Bethune-Cookman University in Daytona Beach. Four Bethune-Cookman University students were shot after the alleged gunman was kicked out of a house party about four blocks from the campus in Daytona Beach. The escaped suspect surrendered on April 6, 2015.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Four Bethune-Cookman University students were shot.
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooting was the result of retaliation for the suspect being kicked out of the party at that address some time ago.

Title: Indianapolis
Description: On Sunday  evening of April 5, three suspects entered the apartment, fired multiple shots, and then fled the scene. Five people were injured, three of them were children. One of three suspects was arrested.
Shooter Name: 2 (two others thought to be involved with the shooting) + Domonique Stone
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Two women and three children. The suspects know the victims and they were inside the apartment when the shooting happened. There was no forced entry.
Possible Motive - Detailed:
The identified suspect charges of burglary, armed robbery, robbery and carrying a handgun without a license.
Investigators said the shooting and burglary may have been drug related.

Title: Rome
Description: On April 7, 2015, the man entered 20 Copeland St. about 11:10 p.m. Tuesday and demanded cash from one of victim. The man then fired a handgun at the victim, killing him. Police said at least two men intended to rob people at the Copeland Street home.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Fourpeople at home
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooter fired his pistol, hitting four people and killing one. He and the other man then took $1,200 from one of the victims.

Title: Phoenix
Description: On April 16, 2015, a man who had been in a business dispute with his two brothers shot and killed them with his mother and one of their wives before taking his own life.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Two men, all brothers, and two women (shooter's mother and one of their wives)
Possible Motive - Detailed: A dispute over how to run the business sent the middle brother into a rage that left four members of his family dead.

Title: Killeen
Description: On April 21, 2015, the man fatally shot two women and wounded three others at the Village West Apartments.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed:
Three women and two men
(One of three women was the apartment manager at the Village West apartments where she lived. She was an Evangelist who moved into the neighborhood to help the other people in the community. She brought some into her home, fed them, and took care of them. The shooter was one of the people she took in. He was her former employee and tenant.)
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Gates Pub
Description: On early Saturday morning of April 25, the man opened fire inside the Gates Pub. Seven people were shot, one of them was killed.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed:
One of seven victims was a targeted attack. 
All six apparently were innocent bystanders who happened to be standing near Jones when the firing began.
Possible Motive - Detailed: There was some sort of dispute. Also the shooter was on parole at the time of his arrest for drugs and weapons possession.

Title: Milwaukee
Description: On May 1, 2015, a suspect shot five people during an altercation in the street that stemmed from a family dispute shortly before 1 a.m. Five people were shot, two people from the same family were killed during a fight early Friday morning.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Uncle, his nephew
Possible Motive - Detailed: One of victim had a child with a women and the two families got into fight and it turned to gun shots.

Title: Fox Cities Trestle Trail bridge over Little Lake Butte des Morts
Description: On May 3, 2015, an argument with his ex-fiance likely motivated a university student to randomly shoot four people  on a bridge at a park Sunday night, three fatally. Then  the gunman also shot and killed himself.
Type of Gun - Detailed:
2 Handguns
9 mm semi-automatic pistol and a revolver
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Randomly shoot people on a bridge along a busy hiking and biking trail
Possible Motive - Detailed: An argument with his ex-fiance likely motivated  a university student to randomly shoot people.
History of Mental Illness - Detailed: Depression, alcohol dependency and suicidal thoughts (He had a blood-alcohol level of 0.24 at the time of the shooting)

Title: Club Maxey's
Description: On May 25, 2015, the shooter was attending a rap concert at a venue called Club Maxey Monday when he and the victim got into an altercation.  The four other people were wounded.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: one person dead and four others injured
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Cleveland
Description: On May 31, 2015, the shooter entered his ex-girlfriend's home and found his ex-girlfriend and her grandfather upstairs, shooting and killing both. He then took his own life.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter's ex-girlfriend and her grandparents
Possible Motive - Detailed: It appears to be a boyfriend-girlfriend type of dispute

Title: Conyers
Description: On May 31, 2015, the shooter entered the business just before 5 pm and open fire. He appeared to randomly shoot at anyone in his path but turns and leaves the building when an armed citizen off-camera returns fire. After the shooter left the liquor store, he  returned to his parents' home and shot and wounded them both.
Relationship to Incident Location:
Place of business/employment
Place of residency
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: A customer and a store clerk at the liquor store, and his parents
Possible Motive - Detailed: It had an altercation with an employee of the Magnet Package store

Title: Deer Lodge
Description: The man shot and killed his wife and three children, set a fire in the family's remote cabin and then killed himself.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter's wife and three children
Possible Motive - Detailed: The man blamed the incident on his wife, telling an acquaintance she had been "mocking him and riding him all day."

Title: Mother Emanuel AME Church
Description: Nine people ? three men and six women including the church's pastor ? were shot and killed during a prayer meeting at a church in Charleston, South Carolina.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Nine people ? three men and six women including the church's pastor ? during a prayer meeting at a black church
Possible Motive - Detailed: Racially motivated hate crime

Title: Boom Boom Room
Description: Two men were arguing in a club called the Boom Boom Room Saturday morning around 2:45. When they started shooting at each other, four bystanders were caught in the crossfire. One of shooters was arrested later, and the other turned himself in on Tuesday, June 23, 2015.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Four bystanders
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooters were arguing before they started shooting at each other

Title: Annual motorcycle event in Newark
Description:
The shooting occurred during an annual event marking the opening of the motorcycle season. More than 2,000 people were in attendance when gunfire erupted at South 16th Street and 19th Avenue just before 8 p.m. Sunday. High school football star Al-Shakeem Woodson was shot and killed and three other people were wounded in the shooting.
The shooting was a result of a long-running feud between two other against the shooter and the 16-year-old.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Innocent bystanders
Possible Motive - Detailed: Two groups involved in a longstanding dispute.

Title: Miami Gardens
Description: The shooter opened fire when fight broke out during birthday party around 5:30 p.m. The man pulled out a gun and opened fire, hitting four people.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Four people at the birthday party
Possible Motive - Detailed: Four people were injured in a shooting Tuesday night after an argument broke out at a birthday party.

Title: River Forest
Description: Two people including the shooter are dead and three others were wounded following what began as a domestic violence incident in River Forest on Sunday morning. Two police officers were among those wounded by gunfire in the incident.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter's mother, 60-year-old man, two police officers
Possible Motive - Detailed: Although detectives have yet to reveal a motive for the shootings, people who know Watson say he's been under a lot of stress lately. The man has been dealing with some stuff like the girlfriend.

Title: Amnicola Training Center, Chattanooga
Description: Four Marines were shot dead Thursday after a gunman brazenly opened fire on two  military facilities in Chattanooga, Tennessee. The shooter was also killed and three people including a police officer were injured.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Four Marines and three people including a police officer
Possible Motive - Detailed: The FBI described him as a ?homegrown violent extremist? but has not determined his motive nor whether he was inspired or directed by foreign extremists such as the Islamic State.
History of Mental Illness - Detailed: The shooter had been in and out of treatment for his depression and frequently stopped taking his medication, despite his parents? pleas for him to continue.

Title: Suwanee
Description: A gunman killed his wife and her two young children inside a suburban Georgia home early Wednesday before fatally shooting himself.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Shooter's wife, wife's father, and his 2 children
Possible Motive - Detailed: No motive for the murder-suicide has been released yet, but police say they were called to the home the night before on a domestic incident.

Title: Suwanee
Description: A gunman killed his wife and her two young children inside a suburban Georgia home early Wednesday before fatally shooting himself.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Shooter's wife, wife's father, and his 2 children
Possible Motive - Detailed: No motive for the murder-suicide has been released yet, but police say they were called to the home the night before on a domestic incident.

Title: Grand 16 Theatre, Louisiana
Description: On July 23, 2015, a shooting occurred at The Grand 16 Theater movie theater in Lafayette, Louisiana. The shooter opened fire during a showing of the film Trainwreck, killing two people and injuring nine others before he committed suicide.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: General public at the theater
Possible Motive - Detailed:
Police investigators are still trying to determine the motive. The shooter has anti-feminist views about women in the workplace and abortion in frequent appearances on a talk show. As details of the shooter's troubled history with the women in his life - including protective orders filed against him by both his daughter and estranged wife, and multiple television appearances filled with anti-women rhetoric - there has been increasing speculation that the man was, in many respects, a misogynist.
The shooter was also known to have suffered from mental health issues.
History of Mental Illness - Detailed:
His wife and relatives asked for a temporary protective order against the shooter in 2008. Court documents filed with the request for the protective order claimed that he ?exhibited extreme erratic behavior and has made ominous as well as disturbing statements.? 
He has a history of mental health issues, i.e., manic depression and/or bi-polar disorder.

Title: Houston, Texas
Description: A family of six children and two parents were handcuffed and fatally shot in the head at a Houston home by a man with a violent criminal history who had previously been in a relationship with the mother and had a dispute with her.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter's ex-girlfriend, her husband and six children, including his own son
Targeted Victim/s - General: Former domestic partner and her family
Possible Motive - Detailed: The killer's motives appear to be related to a dispute with his former domestic partner. The shooter told police officials that he became irate when he arrived at the home and discovered the locks had been changed after moving out. When he noticed an unlocked window, he slipped inside and handcuffed his ex-girlfriend and her husband as well as their five children, including his son before shooting each of them in the head.

Title: Parking lot near Boys and Girls Club
Description:
Around 11:20 p.m. Wednesday on Genesee Street, a gunman shot into a crowd that gathered outside the Rochester Boys and Girls Club after a basketball game, killing three people and wounding four others. 
Drive-by, Gang involvement
Shooter Name:
Johnny Blackshell Junior
Jalen Jamel Everett
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Seven people were shot. Two died at the scene, and one person died later at Strong Memorial Hospital. Four others were hurt. All men who live in the city of Rochester, and all are 20 to 29 years old.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown, Drive-by (car to street, car to car), Gang involvement

Title: Virginia WDBJ live TV interview shooting
Description: Wednesday morning on August 26, 2015, a former employee of a Virginia TV news station waited until two of his former colleagues were live on air presenting a local tourism story at an outdoor shopping mall, then filmed himself raising a gun and shooting them both dead. A third victim survived the attack. He uploaded the videos to Twitter before committing suicide.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter's two ex-coworker (a reporter and a cameraman)
Possible Motive - Detailed: A 23-page fax to the network arrived almost two hours after the shooting. In the message, according to ABC, the gunman said the Charleston, South Carolina, church shooting in June is what put him over the edge, but he wrote that his "anger has been building steadily" because of racial discrimination and sexual harassment he claims to have endured.  (Racial discrimination, supposed revenge for the Charleston church shooting, and Harassment)

Title: Bristol, Tennessee
Description: The shooter shot and killed his mother, stepfather, and grandmother in a matter of seconds on Saturday night.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter's mother, stepfather, and grandmother
Possible Motive - Detailed: The attack appears to stem from the suspect?s long held hatred for his mother. The shooter has hated his mother for most of his life and he has made statements over the years that he wanted to kill her. The shooter wasn't aware of any animosity toward either the grandmother or stepfather, but he thought they would be a witness so he shot them.

Title: Platte, South Dakota
Description: The six members of a South Dakota family found dead in the ruins of their burned home were fatally shot, with one death believed to be a suicide. All six members of the shooter's family died of shotgun wounds.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed:
The shooter's wife and four children
The man shot his wife and four children last week and then set the family home near Platte ablaze before shooting himself.
Possible Motive - Detailed: There is a financial issues surrounding a $4.3 million contract that the state Department of Education told the shooter and his company it would not renew the day before the fire.

Title: Umpqua Community College
Description: On Monday of October 1, 2015, a gunman opened fire at a rural Oregon community college Thursday. 9 people were dead and seven wounded, three critically, before dying in a shootout with police. First, a shot came through the window and hit the teacher in the head  in a freshman writing class. The gunman then entered the Snyder Hall classroom and told people to get on the floor. He told people to stand up and state their religion before opening fire.
Type of Gun - Detailed:
223 Rem [AR-15], 5 Handguns

Six weapons ( five pistols and one rifle) were found at the college. 
Seven firearms (two pistols, four rifles and a shotgun) are found in the gunman's residence.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed:
Students and teacher
The shooter was a student at Umpqua and was enrolled in the class where he opened fire.
Possible Motive - Detailed:
The gunman handed out hate-filled papers & thumb drive before opening fire. He appeared to be obsessed with Satan, and even wrote the number 666 on a sheet of papers that he handed to a victim on Thursday.
Religion may have been a motivating factor. The gunman asked about people's religion before opening fire.
There are a number of indications that the gunman had mental health or behavioral issues (his anger and depression). 
His social media profile indicates a fascination with mass shooters.
History of Mental Illness - Detailed: According to law enforcement sources, the shooter was described as a "hate-filled? individual, with anti-religion and white supremacist leanings who has long struggled with mental health issues.

Title: Northern Arizona University at Flagstaff Campus
Description: On Friday of October 9, 2015, one person is dead and three are wounded after an early morning shooting on Northern Arizona University's campus. An overnight confrontation between two groups of students escalated into gunfire. The shooter is a freshman of Northern Arizona University.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Four students
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooter was kicked out of a frat party. He came back with some friends and started to fight with the victims. Mountain View Hall Delta Chi Frat involved. The cause of the altercation that led to the shooting is not revealed yet.

Title: King, North Carolina
Description: A Couple and their sons were found shot to death in their mobile home on Wednesday, February 4. 2015. All four family members were found shot in the head. The shooter shot his wife and two boys before killing himself.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter's wife and two young sons
Possible Motive - Detailed: There was strife within the marriage, with the couple separating last spring, setting off a custody dispute. A week before the incident, the couple had gotten back together in the summer to try to work things out with counseling. Things seemed to have improved for a while, but her family heard more troubling accounts of the relationship in the weeks leading up to the deaths.

Title: Hill Haven Event Center (Formerly Club CJ's)
Description: A shooting at a club in Meriwether Co. early Sunday injured 10 people after witnesses say gun fire was exchanged that stemmed from alleged illegal gambling.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: 10 people inside the Hill Haven Event Center
Possible Motive - Detailed: An altercation occurred involving several subjects over illegal gambling that was taking place in the back portion of the building.

Title: Colorado Springs
Description: In the morning of October 31, 2015, three victims were shot and killed on the streets and sidewalks of the neighborhood.The gunman died in a shootout with police. A witness described he was walking in the street with two guns, walking calmly. The shooter killed a bicyclist and two women at a nearby location.
Type of Gun - Detailed: AR-15 rifle, a .357 caliber revolver, and a 9mm semi-automatic pistol
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed:
A bicyclist in the streets of Colorado Springs and two women at a nearby location.
The shooting was apparently random.
Possible Motive - Detailed: A motive for the attack remained unknown. Police have looked into a blog post shared by the man before the shooting, but it offered no clues about the man's motives. The shooter instead expressed displeasure with his father, saying he had fallen under the sway of a preacher whose controversial church emphasizes signs of God's miracles and supernatural healing. Harpham struggled with alcoholism.
History of Mental Illness - Detailed: The shooter struggled with alcoholism, which his mother chronicled extensively in her book "He struggled with alcohol and drug addiction in a 2013", and the shooter wrote of being in Alcoholics Anonymous and being sober since December 2013. He met with an Alcoholics Anonymous sponsor regularly.

Title: Oakland, Maine
Description: A gunman shot his girlfriend,  his girlfriend's sister and her boyfriend to death in a Central Maine apartment building, leaving a young girl unharmed on the first floor before turning the weapon on himself. They all shared the brown clapboard home, which was divided into two apartments. The gunman and his girlfriend lived in the upstairs room of the apartment while the two other victims (his girlfriend's sister and her boyfriend) lived in the downstairs with their 3 year old daughter. All three victims were found on first floor.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter's girlfriend, girlfriend's sister, and sister's boyfriend
Possible Motive - Detailed: A neighbor said he could hear an altercation (a scuffle and two loud bangs). According to a neighbors the shooter did not appear to have a job, and spent much of his time sitting on the front steps, drinking. Investigators are still trying to determine a motive.

Title: Inglis, Florida
Description: A man 57-year-old man shot and killed his wife, injured her boyfriend, and killed a Good Samaritan 68-year-old man as he rushed to protect children who were playing near the town hall before taking his life. The shooter's couple had been married for 35 years when they separated, and the shooter's wife had left her husband for her new boyfriend.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter's wife, her boyfriend, and bystander who ran to help
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooter was heartbroken that his wife of 35 years left him. According to the shooter's daughter, he had no idea she was having an affair and pleaded with his wife to return home.

Title: Waycross, GA
Description: On Saturday of November 7, 2015,a pregnant mother of two was killed in a violent rampage early Saturday along with her unborn child. Both of her toddlers were also shot. The shooter is the father of one of the small children.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter's 24-year-old pregnant girlfriend and two children, ages one and three. The shooter is the father of one of the small children.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown
History of Mental Illness - Detailed: The shooter is a US Army veteran who suffered from post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD). He experienced mental issues and left the Army after he witnessed someone get killed.

Title: Jacksonville, Florida
Description: On Friday of November 13, 2015,The former military member walked into his Northside, Florida, home and shot his girlfriend, their twin babies, and girlfriend's father before shooting himself. The shooter had a history of domestic violence.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter's girlfriend, their twin daughters, and girlfriend's father
Possible Motive - Detailed: Two women filed for injunctions for protection against the shooter in 2013 and 2014, according to court records. One was for ?dating violence? and the other was for ?domestic violence without children.? In 2013 he was arrested for strangulation, for which he served two days in jail. Then nearly seven months after that arrest, a woman filed an injunction for protection against the shooter for repeated dating violence. According to the shooter's ex-girlfriend, his behavior grew more erratic, controlling and insecure. She said he would yell, break things, and demand intimacy, which she could never refuse.

Title: Tennessee Colony, Texas
Description: On Sunday of November 15, 2015, six people are dead after a weekend homicide at a private campsite. The bodies of a man and woman were found in a travel trailer. The bodies of four males, who were initially considered missing, were later recovered about 1:15 p.m. Monday in a pond on the suspect's residence.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed:
The shooter was not related to any of the victims. He lived on a large property located next to the land owned by two of victims. The shooter's family reportedly owned the property that was purchased recently by two of victims before it was sold to them. The sheriff said they likely bought the land for camping.
The shooter was drinking with the group Saturday when he accompanied four of them into surrounding woods. One of victim's family heard gunshots before the man returned alone to the campsite, chased her husband and daughter into a travel camper and shot them.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown
History of Mental Illness - Detailed: A former classmate of the shooter told that she knows the man as being violent and verbally abusive. He became more violent after his father died of cancer in December. He started drinking heavily after that, and anger just progressed and got worse.

Title: Columbus, Ohio
Description: On Monday of November 23, 2015, three of four members of a family were shot and killed and a 12-year-old girl wounded at their home. The suspect died after being shot by police. The shooter was a once friendly neighbor of the victims.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed:
The shooter's neighbor family
The shooter was a once friendly neighbor.
Possible Motive - Detailed:
The shooter and one of the victims fell apart over some kind of argument in the past couple of months. 
The shooter served eight months in prison in the 1980s on a vandalism charge out of Cuyahoga County, state records show. He also was cited numerous times for traffic violations, pleaded guilty in 2009 to a case of telephone harassment, and had 2004 charges of assault and domestic violence dismissed, records show.

Title: Minneapolis, Minnesota
Description: Five protesters were shot late Monday night near the Black Lives Matter encampment. A group of white supremacists showed up at the protest, and when about a dozen protesters attempted to herd the group away from the area, they opened fire on the protesters. Protesters have been camping out in front of the 4th Precinct since Nov. 15
Shooter Name:
Daniel Macey
Nathan Gustavsson
Allen Scarsella
Joseph Backman
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Five protesters near the Black Lives Matter encampment
Possible Motive - Detailed: White supremacists opened fire on a demonstration the night before, injuring five people. All three suspects are white. Authorities may treat the shooting as a hate crime.

Title: Colorado Springs, Colorado
Description: On Friday of November 27, 2015, the shooter opened fire inside a Planned Parenthood clinic in Colorado Springs. Three people were killed and nine others were hurt. The shooter surrendered to officers after a five-hour ordeal Friday in which he fired randomly at people in the clinic and roamed the halls shooting through walls with an assault-style rifle.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Three people, including a police officer were killed in the shooting and nine others, including five police officers, were injured.  Two civilians were also killed.
Possible Motive - Detailed: The suspect talked about politics and abortion. The shooter said "no more baby parts" in reference to Planned Parenthood. Anti-abortion (Political/Religious ideals). The shooter's courtroom outburst backed up his previous claims indicating the attack was motivated by anti-abortion beliefs.  This shooting marks the ninth murder by anti-abortion activists since 1977.

Title: Omaha, Nebraska
Description: A woman and her two year old daughter were shot and killed Sunday. Three other women are still fighting for their lives following the shooting.  The suspect turned himself into police on Tuesday morning.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter's girlfriend, her 2-year-old daughter, and three friends of his girlfriend
Possible Motive - Detailed: A motive for the shooting was unclear, but neighbors heard the man and his girlfriend arguing loudly outside.

Title: Chesapeake, Virginia
Description: A Virginia man shot his brother dead in their family home, then killed four other relatives in a nearby house before turning the gun on himself Wednesday. He killed his brother in their house around 3:35 p.m. He then went to the house belonging to his grandmother and murdered more relatives ? father, mother, sister, and an unidentified female.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Shooter's father, mother, brother, sister, and grandmother
Possible Motive - Detailed: The family believes the trigger that pushed this mental break was about the man being forced to move out of grandmother's home. The man had been helping to take care of the 74-year-old grandmother, but as her health declined, the family was moving her to North Carolina. They had a family meeting to tell the man that Monday night. Family members tell us that's when and why they believe the man snapped. They knew he would not be happy about the move back to his father's house.  Police aren't sure of a motive yet.
History of Mental Illness - Detailed: The shooter had always struggled with emotional and mental issues and he was in and out of doctors? offices and the hospital his entire life according to his family member.

Title: Orlando, Florida
Description: Two people were killed and several others were hurt in a mass shooting inside an Orlando nightclub early Sunday morning.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooting was not random. It started as a fight between two groups, and the two men who died were on opposite sides of the altercation. The rest of wounded people were  on opposite sides of the altercation and innocent bystanders.
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooting started as a fight between two groups, and the two men who died were on opposite sides of the altercation. The rest of wounded people were innocent bystanders.

Title: Kalamazoo, Michigan
Description: On Saturday evening of February 20, 2016, the gunman shot eight people in three different parts of the county. For nearly five hours Saturday, the shooter drove from one target to another, gunning down victims at random. And in between the shootings, he apparently picked up passengers for Uber.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: He shot a woman in front of her children at an apartment complex parking lot. The woman was struck multiple times but is expected to survive. Four hours later, the gunman killed a father and son at a car dealership. Minutes afterward, he drove to a Cracker Barrel restaurant and opened fire in the parking lot, killing four women and wounding a 14-year-old girl.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Glendale, Arizona
Description: Five family members are dead after the son opened fire at their house on Tuesday morning. The shooter killed his father, his mother, his 18-year-old sister, and his 6-year-old sister. Police fatally shot the  shooter after a confrontation inside the home.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter's parents and two sisters
Possible Motive - Detailed: There had been some indications of drug use that they had moved out of state. There was drug abuse alleged or even some treatment that it was alleged in Oklahoma where the family had resided
History of Mental Illness - Detailed: Family members say Buckner had been diagnosed with schizophrenia and would frequently talk to himself, set fires in the garage and yell at other family members.

Title: Hesston, Kansas
Description: On Friday, 90 minutes after receiving a court order over domestic violence, the man returned to the factory for the shooting spree.The man who wounded three people before storming into the central Kansas the lawn mower factory where he worked and shooting 14 others, killing three of them, had just been served a protection from abuse order that likely triggered the attack. Police say they believe the man fired at random while he was returning to his workplace.
Type of Gun - Detailed: A .223-caliber assault-style rifle and semi-automatic pistol
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: He fired randomly at coworkers. Three people were killed and fourteen others were wounded, and at least five of those victims are in critical condition.
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooter had been served a protection from abuse order earlier Thursday at the factory, which may have triggered the bloodshed. He left the factory after being served but began shooting about 90 minutes later.

Title: Belfair, Washington
Description: At around 9am on Friday morning, a man phoned an officer with the Mason County Sheriff's Office to say that he had shot his family and was going to kill himself next. The man was flushed out of his house when the SWAT team fired tear gas inside. He walked outside and shot himself in front of the officers who were gathered in front of the property. The shooter killed his wife, her two teenage sons and a neighbor.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter killed his wife, her two teenage sons and a neighbor.
Possible Motive - Detailed: A neighbor said the man had recently been hospitalized for unknown reasons, and that he was taking a lot of medication after he was discharged.

Title: Woodbridge, Virginia
Description: On Saturday of February 27th, three officers arrived to investigate a domestic dispute call, the shooter fired a rifle from the front door of his home, striking all three. Inside the house, police found his wife dead in a bedroom.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter's wife and three police officers
Possible Motive - Detailed: The officers arrived at the shooter's home in reference to a domestic dispute. The shooter and his wife had been arguing all day Saturday, but it escalated after she called 911.

Title: Woodbridge, Virginia
Description: On Saturday of February 27th, three officers arrived to investigate a domestic dispute call, the shooter fired a rifle from the front door of his home, striking all three. Inside the house, police found his wife dead in a bedroom.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter's wife and three police officers
Possible Motive - Detailed: The officers arrived at the shooter's home in reference to a domestic dispute. The shooter and his wife had been arguing all day Saturday, but it escalated after she called 911.

Title: Chelsea, Massachusetts
Description: The shooting happened early Sunday morning during a party in a vacant apartment. The shooter pened fire with one gun at a party of about 50 people in an vacant, three-room apartment. A 19-year-old Chelsea resident was was killed in a shooting that wounded five other teens and a 22-year-old.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: 19-year-old male killed. The surviving shooting victims were three males, ages 15, 18, and 22, and three females, ages 15, 17, and 18. Six other people, including the suspect's step-brother, were taken to the hospital with gunshot injuries not considered life-threatening.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Prosecutors didn’t reveal a motive in court. Kyes said the case is still under investigation, but he added the shooting was not gang-related.

Title: Kansas City, Kansas
Description: Four people were found dead Monday night in a home in Kansas City, Kansas. A fifth man was shot to death Tuesday in Missouri. The shooter lives in a house next door to the home where four people were found shot Monday night. The shooter and the neighbors are all familiar with each other.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: One of the men killed in Kansas City lived in the home where the victims were found and next to the shooter's house. The other three were friends who live in the same neighborhood. Also a man who lived in Missouri where the shooter's car was found was killed.
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooter was charged with domestic battery in June 2015 and was held in the Wyandotte County jail. He was also previously deported for being in the country illegally.

Title: Plantation, Florida
Description: A Spring Break party in a house packed with 400 people ended in gunfire that killed one man and wounded four others.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: House party, over 400 guests
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Louisville, Kentucky
Description: A former soldier who fatally shot his wife and two children and set their house on fire before killing himself suffered from post-traumatic stress disorder following a military career that included a stint in Iraq.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter's wife and two children
Possible Motive - Detailed:
The shooter's family said, he suffered from post-traumatic stress disorder following a military career that included a stint in Iraq. 
 Vs. 
 A psychiatrist with University of Louisville Physicians, said the actions were so violent, they had to be attributed to more than just PTSD.
History of Mental Illness - Detailed: According to the shooter's family, the Army Reserve veteran had been seeking help for complications associated with PTSD and was attending marriage counseling with his wife.

Title: Lawrenceburg, Tennessee
Description: The man was suspected of shooting his wife and two sons on Friday morning at the family’s home. All three victims were initially shot inside the residence with a shotgun.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter's wife and two sons
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown
History of Mental Illness - Detailed: According to the extended family members, the shooter has mental illness.

Title: Louisburg, North Carolina
Description: Three people were killed in a shooting at a home. The shooter was on probation after being released from prison about two weeks ago. He was required to wear an ankle bracelet that monitored his whereabouts, but removed the device on Friday — the day before the shootings.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Unknown
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Richmond, Virginia
Description: A man fatally shot a Virginia state trooper at a Greyhound bus station before the gunman was killed by other troopers. The trooper had been participating with about a dozen other troopers in a training exercise at the bus station when a brief encounter with the gunman quickly turned violent. The shooter had been sitting in the restaurant at the bus station and went to his luggage near the front entrance. He began to walk away from his bags. The trooper approached the suspect. Shortly after the two talked for a few seconds, with the suspect to the trooper’s immediate right, the shooter pulled a gun from his waistband and shot the trooper from just inches away.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: A state trooper, two civilians
Possible Motive - Detailed: Investigators are still trying to figure out his motive for the shooting. Relatives said the shooter 'had a lot of anger about the police'.

Title: Roadside in Memphis, Tennessee
Description: A woman flagged down a car to help her with her car troubles at the side of the road. An 18-year-old got out to help. The two suspects got out of another car and fired on the scene.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Victims appear to be completely random. They were at the side of the road helping a stranger with her car.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Wilmington, DE robbery
Description: Two men forcefully entered a house, and started shooting the people inside. One of the robbers was killed. Four other people injured.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Victims appear to be random targets in a robbery
Possible Motive - Detailed: Robbery

Title: Gloucester County, VA, House Party
Description: A young woman threw a house party for her birthday. It got very crowded. The shooter came and shot four people, killing one. There is some disagreement about his relation to the rest of the people at the party
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Party goers - 18-year-old Male was killed, 15-year-old girl, and two 20-year-old males were injured
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Gloucester County, VA, House Party
Description: A young woman threw a house party for her birthday. It got very crowded. The shooter came and shot four people, killing one. There is some disagreement about his relation to the rest of the people at the party
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Party goers - 18-year-old Male was killed, 15-year-old girl, and two 20-year-old males were injured
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Florida family murder
Description: A young man shot his mother, step-father, and his ex-girlfriend's boyfriend
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Shooter's mother, step-father, and ex-girlfriend's boyfriend
Possible Motive - Detailed: Frustration at his family and ex-girlfriend's new boyfriend. There does not appear to be one motive.

Title: Los Angeles Drive-by
Description: Group of people was standing outside of a Liquor store on Avalon boulevard in South Los Angeles. A car drove by and fired an AK-47, killing 1 and wounding 3.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Relationship of victims to shooters in unknown
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Perris, CA Mexican restaurant shooting
Description: Very little is known about the case. Cops were called to a Mexican restaurant. 1 person was pronounced dead at the scene. 4 others were taken to a hospital.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Relationship of victims to shooters in unknown
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Chesapeake, VA Family Murder Suicide
Description: 26-year-old killed his Mother, Father, Grandmother, brother, and sister before killing himself in the home of his Grandmother.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: All five of the victims were the shooter's family.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Caroline County, VA Family Murder Suicide
Description: 42-year-old husband murders wife, shoots two young family members, then shoots himself in the head.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Shot and killed his wife. Shot and injured two young family members. Then killed himself.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Domestic Dispute

Title: Glendale, AZ House Party shooting
Description: Altercation broke out at a house party. A group of five hispanics were asked to leave. They got in a car, and as they drove away, opened fire on the house.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Some of the party goers may have been specific targets, but some were random victims
Possible Motive - Detailed: Social Dispute

Title: New Orleans gas station shoot-out
Description: Altercation broke out at a gas station in New Orleans, when the shooter shot and injured 3 people. One of the victims returned fire and injured the instigator.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Unknown
Possible Motive - Detailed: Social Dispute

Title: Tampa, FL Strip club shooting
Description: Fighting broke out in a strip club when an unknown shooter starting firing. One person died on the scene, and one died later. Six were injured.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Unknown
Possible Motive - Detailed: Social Dispute

Title: Los Angeles, CA street shooting
Description: Police were called to a street to investigate an assault case. One hispanic man lay dead on the street. Two other adult males, and a young female were injured.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Unknown
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Texas teen commits family murder suicide
Description: 19-year-old male kills his mother and two neighbors before killing himself. Motive is unclear.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: First target was the shooter's mother. Then he killed a 60-year-old male neighbor that had an undefined romantic relationship with his mother. A teenage boy that was with the neighbor was also killed.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Nightclub fight turns into shootout
Description: Two groups of people fired at each other after a fight broke out outside of the Mexican Village Nightclub in Rochester, NY
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Unknown
Possible Motive - Detailed: Social Dispute

Title: Michigan school shooting
Description: Shooter was a part of a fight outside of a high school gym. He fired at a crowd, injuring three. He fled the scene and was confronted by a police officer. When he wouldn't drop his weapon, the police officer shot and injured him.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Shooter got into an argument, but their relationship to each other is unknown
Possible Motive - Detailed: Social Dispute

Title: Vallejo, CA car shooting
Description: Two suspects shot at a car and killed one person outright, and the second victim died in the hospital. Two others injured. No leads on suspects.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Unclear if targeted or random victims. 2 Males died. Two injured - including one child.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Florida Hookah Bar Shooting
Description: Argument led to gun shots in the parking lot outside of a hookah bar in Tampa, Florida
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: 29-year-old Male killed. Three others injured.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Argument in the hookah bar

Title: Kalamazoo Uber Driver Spree Killing
Description: An Uber driver fired upon people in three locations over the course of about 6 hours.
Type of Gun - Detailed: Two different handguns were used, 9 mm Walther P99 semi-automatic handgun, and 9 mm Glock 19 semi-automatic handgun
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The first people killed were Tyler D. Smith (17), and his father Richard E. Smith (53), who were both killed at the Kia car dealership. Four women – Mary Jo Nye (60),Mary Lou Nye (62), Dorothy Brown (74), and Barbara Hawthorne (68)– were killed at the Cracker Barrel.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Missouri Highway shooting
Description: Car was fired upon from a stolen Mercedes on the interstate in Hazelwood, MO. One woman died. 3 Injured.
Shooter Name: John Howard Stith, 20, joins Tony Bailey, 21, Jerrod Corley, 24, and Leroy Coleman, 20
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The woman killed had dated one of the shooters
Possible Motive - Detailed: Long-standing social dispute has been suggested between the victim and one of the shooters

Title: Houston Drive-by
Description: Group of people was fired upon by an unknown number of people in a dark SUV and a white Ford Truck. Five people, including a baby, were injured.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Four adults and one baby who were standing on the street.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Arizona Family Murder
Description: Son shot his parents and two sisters in their Phoenix home. Police arrive because the house was on fire. Police shot and killed the shooter.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Shooter's mother, father, and two sisters. Then the shooter was killed by the police
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Belfair, WA Family murder-suicide
Description: Man killed wife, two kids, and neighbor before calling the cops to tell them he did something bad. They fired tear gas to get him outside. He came out and shot himself in the head.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Shooter's wife, two kids, and neighbor
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Detroit Strip Club Shootout
Description: Man apparently inappropriately touched a stripper. He was asked to leave. He waited outside, then shot the stripper and four other people.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Stripper and four other strip club patrons
Possible Motive - Detailed: Shooter was upset for being kicked out of the club

Title: Riverside restaurant shooting
Description: Shooter fired upon group of people in a restaurant parking lot
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: One adult male was killed, three adult males injured.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Wichita Nightclub shooting
Description: Altercation led to group of people getting kicked out of a club. Shooting took place around 1am outside the club. Four injured.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Four adult club goers.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Chelsea, MA empty apartment party shooting
Description: Shooter fired upon party of ~50 people at an empty apartment in Chelsea, MA. 1 dead. 6 wounded. Shooters step brother was among those shot
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: One male teen (19) killed, six other young people between ages 15-22. It is reported the step-brother of the shooter was amongst those injured.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Roswell, GA Hookah shootout
Description: Altercation in a hookah bar led a group of seven people to leave in a mini-van. They were followed. When the car stopped, the shooter fired upon the car. Four of the seven sustained non-life-threatening injuries.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Four friends that were at a Hookah bar
Possible Motive - Detailed: Shooter became upset when his advances on one of the victims was rejected.

Title: Lafayette, LA drive by
Description: Four people shot with non-life-threatening injuries during a drive-by on MLK boulevard in Lafayette, LA. There were multiple shooters in the Ford f-150 truck, truck fled the scene. No leads.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Four males
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Kansas City Home Invasion
Description: Shooter killed four people at his next door neighbors house. He fled the scene, but was captured the next day, hiding in a ditch. It is seen as a random act.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Four males were shot in the house next door to where the shooter lived.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Wilkinsburg BBQ cookout shootout
Description: A family was having a cookout in the backyard of a house when two gunmen came and started shooting. There is one suspected target, but 5 people were killed, including one pregnant woman. The two gunmen fled the scene and have not been identified.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: 8 people, three of whom were sisters, and two more were cousins. Their relationship to the shooter is unknown
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Trenton, NJ sidewalk shooting
Description: A group of women were arguing on a sidewalk outside of an apartment complex in Trenton, NJ when a black Acura pulled up. Two men got out. And one shot at the women, injuring five.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Three females (22, 24, 44) and two males (41, 44) were injured.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Detroit Drive-by
Description: Four men were sitting on a porch when a black SUV with three passengers drove by and opened fire in broad daylight. Two of the men died and two were injured. The SUV got away and there are no suspects
Type of Gun - Detailed: Multiple guns - one pistol and one rifle
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Two men (43, 63) killed, two injured (43, 63). Police think there was one target.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Elberton, Georgia murder-suicide
Description: Domestic dispute led a man to shoot his girlfriend, kill her daughter, and injure a bystander who was trying to help the girlfriend
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Shooter girlfriend was injured, her daughter (17) was killed, and a bystander who picked up the girlfriend was also injured when they tried to drive off and were shot at.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Shooter and his girlfriend were in an argument about his abuse of alcohol.

Title: Florida Family celebration ends in shooting
Description: Family was celebrating a birthday party when a group of 12 arrived. Fight broke out, four people shot.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Four people were shot and taken to the hospital with non-life threatening injuries.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Atlanta Nightclub shooting
Description: Two groups of people were asked to leave a nightclub when they started arguing. They were outside the club when they started shooting. Five people were injured.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Five innocent people were injured.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Social dispute

Title: Wetumpka Drive-by
Description: Shooter fired 12 rounds from a semi-automatic handgun that left two dead and two critically injured in a Saturday afternoon drive-by in Wetumpka, Alabama.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: One male (48), one female (19) were killed, two males injured (20, 24). According to family members, the suspect was related to the deceased victims.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Spring Break Party shooting
Description: Shooter fired into crowd at a spring break house party with over 400 people, killing one, and injuring four. No one provided any information about the shooter, who escaped.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: One 27-year-old male was killed at the scene. Wounded included: three females (16, 17, 18) and one male (21)
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Louisville, KY Family Murder-Suicide
Description: Husband murders his wife and two children before committing suicide at their Kentucky home
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Wife of shooter (age 32), daughter (age 4), son (age 5) and killed himself (age 33)
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Greenhill, AL Family murder-suicide
Description: Husband murders his wife and injures his two sons at their home in rural Alabama, then commits suicide
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Wife of shooter (age 48) died, injured two sons (28, 26), and killed himself (age 49)
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown
History of Mental Illness - Detailed: One article references a history of mental illness

Title: Albuquerque, NM Family restaurant shooting
Description: The shooter killed two of his nephews at the restaurant they owned. He shot and injured his brother. Then killed himself.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The shooter killed his two male nephews (age 24, 31) at the restaurant, injured his brother there, and killed himself a few minutes later, after driving away from the scene
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Chicago Birthday Party Bus Shooting
Description: Birthday party bus was dropping off party goers in South Shore Chicago when someone on the street started shooting at them. The bus driver drove off quickly protecting the targets. Unknown motivation. No suspects.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Five people aged between 22 and 30. Four were taken to the hospital. None have been named.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Albuquerque, NM House party shooting
Description: A Man shot four uninvited party guests who would not leave the party hosted by the shooter. He started firing when they broke windows and started kicking in the door.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Four strangers
Possible Motive - Detailed: The shooter was hosting a party, and uninvited guests were trying to enter the house. He fired at them.

Title: Memphis, TN gas station shooting
Description: Four people were shot below the waist at a gas station after an altercation broke out at a gas station.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Four unidentified people
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Long Beach Street murder
Description: Group of men were standing at a street corner when someone came up and fired upon them. One man died, 3 injured. Nothing is known about the shooter.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: One young father was killed, 3 other unidentified victims injured.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Chicago Rap video Shootout
Description: Group of young men were in a park at 2 in the morning when a male walked up and shot them. One fatality. Four injuries. Shooter is unknown.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Five young men. One fatality. Four injured.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown. Possible gang, but unclear.

Title: Texas family murder-suicide
Description: Man killed his wife and two young children before committing suicide. No explanation has been offered
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: 5-year-old daughter, 2-year-old-son, 35-year-old wife, and the shooter was 37
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Alabama highway random shooting
Description: Shooter fired from his car at two different locations along a highway in rural Alabama. He didn't injure any at the first shootout, but injured four at the second. He was killed by police.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Four people in their cars on the highway, appears they were random targets
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown
History of Mental Illness - Detailed: The shooter was bipolar, said his father.

Title: Tire-Slashing revenge escalation
Description: Shooter was angry over fact that rival families had been slashing each other's cars. Shooter fired into a block party and injured four.
Type of Gun - Detailed: One article references a handgun charge
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: Doesn't seem there was one particular target, but the shooter was seemingly getting revenge on a group of people. He hit a 12, 16, 18, and 33-year-old.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Two groups of families were slashing each other's cars. It escalated with this shooting.

Title: Forestville, Maryland Drive-by
Description: Shooter shot from his car at people standing on the street at 1:30 AM. Police don't believe the woman who died was the target, and do not believe the shooting was random.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: 49-year-old Woman died at scene. Four others injured.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Unknown

Title: Ferguson, MO Drive by
Description: A group of 15 to 20 people was gathered for a memorial for a family member when two cars drove by and opened fire. Four people were injured. No suspects or specific motive or targets.
Targeted Victim/s - Detailed: The victims were gathered to mourn the death of a family member.
Possible Motive - Detailed: Social retaliation
